name: Daytona's
text:
Breakfast
small breakfast 9.50 two eggs + toast
eggs benedict 18 two poached eggs topped with hollandaise, served with choice of peameal, ham or chorizo, served on an english muffin
steak + eggs 19.50 sirloin, two eggs any style, sauteed mushrooms + onions, choice of toast
meat lover's omelette 18 bacon, ham, chorizo sausage, mozzarella and cheddar cheese, choice of toast
western omelette 17 diced red + green peppers, tomato, bacon, cheddar + mozzarella cheese, choice of toast
blt 16 bacon, lettuce, tomato, fried egg, aged white cheddar, mayo, served on marble rye or ciabatta
hearty skillet 17 bacon, chopped sausage, ham, cheddar + mozzarella, fire roasted tomato, scrambled eggs, served on shredded hash browns, choice of toast
breakfast poutine 15.50 fried potatoes, bacon, green onion, peppers, chorizo sausage, cheese curds, hollandaise, poached egg + buttermilk fried onions
tiny pancakes 16 three pancakes, choice of bacon, ham or sausage | add peameal bacon $1.50
traditional breakfast 14 two eggs any style, choice of bacon, ham or sausage, choice of toast
daytona's deluxe 17.50 three eggs any style, bacon, ham +sausage, choice of toast
ham + cheese omelette 17 black forest ham, cheddar + mozzarella, choice of toast
everything omelette 17.50 peppers, green onion, tomato, ham, bacon, mushrooms, cheddar + mozzarella, choice of toast
denver sandwich 16 black forest ham, green onions, cheddar swiss cheese, served on your choice of toast
fried chicken + waffles benedict 18.50 buttermilk fried chicken, honey, poached egg, hollandaise, chipotle mayo
mexican skillet 17 chorizo sausage, peppers, onion, scrambled eggs, manchego cheese, pico de gallo, chipotle lime crème, served on shredded hash browns, choice of toast
buttermilk pancakes 16.50 three pancakes, choice of bacon, ham or sausage | add peameal bacon $1
french toast 16.50 three slices, choice of bacon, ham or sausage | add peameal bacon $1
bacon (4 pieces) 4 | ham (2 pieces) 4 | sausage (4 pieces) 4 | hollandaise sauce 2.50 | peameal bacon (2 pieces) 6 | toast 3 | extra egg 3 | home fries 5 | seasonal fruit 5 | pancake (1) 4
coffee 2.50 | tea 2.50 | specialty tea 3 | milk 3 | juice 3
Starters
steakhouse potato skins 15 shaved beef, blue cheese, cheddar cheese, bbq sauce, crispy onions
fried brussel sprouts 16 blue cheese, honey pepper bacon, balsamic glaze
buttermilk chicken strips 17 buttermilk fried chicken strips, chipotle mayo or spicy dill dip | add side for $5
crab cakes 18 sweet potato puree, apple slaw, arugula, onion vinaigrette, rice sweet potato
nashville hot chicken dip 17 fried chicken, spicy pickles, crema, dill pickles, tortilla chips, focaccia bread
mozza sticks 18 herb breaded house made mozza sticks, fresh parm, marinara and garlic parm dip
nachos 25 corn tortilla chips, chorizo sausage, banana pepper, tomato, green onion, bacon, mozza + cheddar
korean fried cauliflower 17 korean bbq sauce, poblano lime mayo, sesame seeds, green onion
short rib poutine 18 braised short rib, house cut fries, peppered gravy, cheese curds
wings 18/30 one or two pounds tossed in your choice of sauce, carrot sticks, ranch or blue cheese
hot, medium, mild, chipotle bbq, hot cajun honey, honey garlic, sweet thai, cajun, salt + pepper, roasted garlic + pepper, mango chipotle, memphis, korean bbq, bacon rouge, dakota, louisiana, honey bbq
Salads + Pizzas
caesar salad 17 romaine, house caesar dressing, bacon, croutons, pecorino
warm goat cheese salad 19 mixed greens, goat cheese, red onion, pecorino, honey balsamic, grape tomato
steak salad 26 romaine, grape tomato, roasted red peppers, red onion, goat cheese, balsamic glaze, tomato vinaigrette, 6oz sirloin steak
autumn squash + cranberry salad 17 maple sage vinaigrette, spinach, craisins, squash, red onion, pumpkin seeds, goat cheese, focaccia croutons
shaved brussel sprout salad 17 shaved brussel sprouts, arugula, dill onion vinaigrette, candied walnuts, feta cheese, figs, fried sweet potato, pecorino
add chicken, steak, salmon to any salad $10
honey hot pepperoni pizza 22 honey pepper bacon, red onion, roasted red peppers, pepperoni, marinara, mozzarella, hot honey drizzle, pecorino
sweet potato + spinach pizza 22 sweet potato puree, caramelized onion, spinach, mozzarella, sun dried tomato, balsamic
pancetta goat cheese 22 marinara, mozzarella, goat cheese, pancetta, caramelized onion, fire roasted tomato, pesto, balsamic glaze
squash + sausage pizza 22 confit garlic, italian rosemary sausage, mozzarella, butternut squash, feta, figs
Hand Helds
buttermilk chicken wrap 23 fried chicken, honey dill mayo, tomato, shredded lettuce, cheddar + mozzarella, grilled flour tortilla
hot honey fried chicken sandwich 23.5 buttermilk fried chicken, hot + honey sauce, house pickles, ancho chipotle mayo, slaw, aged cheddar, kaiser
beef dip 22.5 slow roasted beef, garlic mayo, swiss cheese, sauteed mushrooms + onion, herb jus, baguette
clubhouse 22 house roasted turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, cheddar, mayo, choice of bread
salmon club 24 blackened salmon, lettuce, tomato, bacon, smoked cheddar, garlic mayo, grilled naan bread
blackened chicken sandwich 24 blackened chicken, bacon, ancho chipotle mayo, cheddar, lettuce, tomato, grilled naan bread
daytona burger 25 peameal bacon, swiss + cheddar, lettuce, tomato, garlic mayo, kaiser, buttermilk fried onion
reuben 23 pastrami, 1000 island dressing, house made sauerkraut, grilled marble rye, mustard, swiss, house pickles
roasted tomato blt 22 focaccia, roasted tomato, goat cheese, pancetta, bacon, arugula, tomato jam
peppercorn steak sandwich 25 brandy peppercorn sauce, sirloin, arugula, roasted tomato, chimichurri mayo, buttermilk fried onion, marble rye
maple rosemary burger 25 maple soy glazed bacon, garlic rosemary mayo, aged white cheddar, shredded lettuce, chipotle bbq sauce, tomato, kaiser
chicken pesto sandwich 22 grilled chicken, pesto, feta cheese, lettuce, tomato, cucumber, garlic mayo, focaccia bread
all hand helds come with choice of soup, fries, caesar, garden or greek salad substitute sweet potato fries or poutine for 4.50
Large Plates
roasted chicken supreme 35 butternut squash risotto, sun dried tomato, fresh herbs, roasted chicken supreme, goat's cheese, pan jus, fried sage
braised short rib 36 slow cooked short rib, espagnole sauce, roasted asparagus, crispy sweet potato, cauliflower mashed potato, fresh herbs
short rib shepherd's pie 23 garlic mashed potato, aged white cheddar, peas, carrots, celery
steak oscar 37 8oz sirloin, bearnaise sauce, crab, asparagus, mashed or fries
smoked mac + cheese 28 rigatoni, smoked cheese sauce, fire roasted tomato, pancetta, arugula, pecorino
italian sausage pappardelle 28 italian sausage ragu, pappardelle noodles, fresh basil, bourisin, goat's cheese, parsley, pecorino
Daytona's Kids Menu
$7 With the Choice of Side & Drink
Entrees Chicken Strips Cheeseburger Mac and Cheese Grilled Cheese Sandwich Pepperoni and Cheese Pizza
Sides Fries Caesar Salad Veg and Dip
Drinks White Milk Chocolate Milk Apple Juice Orange Juice
Desserts
sticky toffee 7.5 sticky toffee cake, salted caramel, vanilla ice cream
buttertart cheesecake 7.5 caramel cheesecake, pecan raisin caramel sauce
white chocolate brownie 8 vanilla ice cream, chocolate sauce, whipped cream
carrot cake 7 crème anglaise, walnuts, candied carrot
feature dessert see your server for our current dessert feature
